About.title: About
About.subtitle: Kryfal
About.description: Experts in Threat Intelligence and digital investigations, protecting companies against advanced cyber threats. Kryfal was born from a realization: the sectors that form the backbone of the economy are the most neglected in cyber intelligence. While the market focuses on generic threats, we dive into the specific ecosystems of Agribusiness, Ports, Aerospace, and the new Web3 economy, delivering intelligence that decision-makers can use to make strategic choices and protect their most valuable assets.

Posicionamento.title: Our Positioning
Posicionamento.description: There is no effective threat intelligence without deep business knowledge. That’s why Kryfal positions itself at the intersection of cyber expertise and the operational reality of the most critical sectors. Instead of offering generic solutions, we dive into your value chain to understand who the threat actors are, how they think, and how they act to truly compromise your business continuity.

brand_protection.title: Corporate Counterintelligence
brand_protection.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for maximum-trust decisions.
brand_protection.list_title_Description_desafio: The integrity of your operation directly depends on the robustness of your supply chain — which includes both external suppliers and internal human capital. Failure to rigorously vet a single link, whether a critical logistics partner or a newly hired executive, can introduce vulnerabilities into your entire structure. Superficial credential checks and purely financial audits are insufficient to detect the most harmful risks: premeditated fraud, conflicts of interest, and hidden legal and reputational liabilities. Hiring or partnering without a prior Background Check is managing the business based on an incomplete and dangerous view of your partners’ operational and ethical reality.
brand_protection.list_title_solucao: Decisions Based on Facts, Not Assumptions
brand_protection.list_title_Description_solucao: Our Corporate Intelligence and Investigations service acts as your due diligence and fact-finding unit. We discreetly and methodically verify facts, analyze histories, and expose hidden risks before they become problems. Combining advanced open-source investigation techniques (OSINT), data analysis, and, when necessary, field inquiries, we provide a complete dossier to ensure that your hiring, partnership, and investment decisions are based on verified information.

SectionServiceSecond.title: Our Counterintelligence Solutions
SectionServiceSecond.description: We investigate, analyze, and expose hidden risks to protect your operation from internal and external threats.

card1.title: Third-Party Due Diligence
card1.description: We thoroughly investigate potential partners, suppliers, or M&A targets. We map corporate structure, partners’ reputational and legal history (KYP - Know Your Partner), and identify hidden liabilities or involvement in illicit activities.

card2.title: Background Check (Profile Analysis)
card2.description: We conduct in-depth checks on candidates and employees in key positions. We analyze professional history, lawsuits, digital reputation, and potential conflicts of interest to ensure your team’s integrity and reliability.

card3.title: Fraud Investigation and Response
card3.description: We investigate suspicions of fraud, corruption, asset theft, and internal sabotage. We collect evidence in a structured way, identify those involved, and provide detailed reports that support administrative and legal actions.

card4.title: Internal Risk and Conflict of Interest Mapping
card4.description: We analyze your employees’ ecosystem and connections to identify undeclared relationships with competitors, suspicious side activities, and other risk factors not revealed by traditional audits.

leak_detection.title: Strategic and Tactical Threat Intelligence
leak_detection.description: Turning raw threat data into clarity and decision-making advantage for your business.
leak_detection.list_title_Description_desafio: Your company may have access to security feeds and even Deep Web alerts, but how to connect those dots? How to translate a technical indicator into a real business risk? And how to ensure the right person — from the SOC analyst to the CEO — receives the right intelligence, in the right format, at the right time to act? Information without context is just noise.
leak_detection.list_title_Description_solucao: Our Threat Intelligence service acts as your intelligence fusion center. We go beyond simple data collection, working on analysis, contextualization, and tailored reporting for every level of your organization. We integrate information from multiple sources — including our specialized Deep & Dark Web monitoring, OSINT (open sources), and technical feeds — to build a 360° view of your threat landscape and deliver insights that guide everything from threat hunting to security investment decisions.

SectionServiceSecond.title: Intelligence at All Levels
SectionServiceSecond.description: From strategy to action, we provide applicable intelligence for all levels of your organization.

card1.title: Strategic Intelligence (For Leadership)
card1.description: We deliver executive reports that link the threat landscape (actors, trends, geopolitical risks) directly to your business goals and continuity. Our analyses answer the (why) and (what if), recommending strategic and investment directions.

card2.title: Tactical Intelligence (For Active Defense)
card2.description: We produce detailed dossiers on the Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTPs) of attack groups targeting your sector. We describe their methods and tools to enrich your threat hunting, enhance detection rules, and train your defense team.

card3.title: Operational Intelligence (For SOC)
card3.description: We provide contextualized alerts about ongoing attack campaigns. Here, we enrich findings from our DDW service and other sources with your business context, answering (what does this mean for us now?) and delivering high-fidelity IOCs for incident response.

card4.title: Vulnerability Intelligence (For IT and Infrastructure)
card4.description: We monitor and analyze vulnerabilities (CVEs) relevant to your tech stack and actively discussed or exploited by cybercriminals. This enables risk-based patching prioritization, not just theoretical severity.

card2.description: Adopt a security posture where intelligence drives all defensive actions, from firewall blocks to board-level strategies.

card3.title: Team Synergy

card4.title: Maximized Security ROI

vip_protection.title: Deep & Dark Web Asset Surveillance and Protection
vip_protection.description: A unified service to monitor both threat actors and your exposed digital assets.
vip_protection.list_title_Description_desafio: Your company faces two critical and invisible risks: the adversary planning an attack and your own sensitive data that may already be compromised. How to monitor both sides of this equation — the hunter and the prey — in an anonymous, hostile environment like the Deep & Dark Web? Hiring separate solutions creates complexity and disconnects intelligence from action.
vip_protection.list_title_Description_solucao: Our Asset Surveillance and Protection service offers a complete view of your risk in the digital underworld. We unify Threat Intelligence (attacker monitoring) with Exposed Asset Detection (searching for your data) in a single offering. Through a centralized platform and the expertise of our analysts, we correlate criminals’ intentions with the actual exposure of your data, enabling truly proactive defense and much more effective incident response.
